Articles.Content:
Since we have docks now... I hope bodies of water, and whatever the hell is there on Eve and Laythe (and on exoplanets later on) act like they should. My point being: while you can somewhat easily move underwater in KSP1, assuming the craft's ability to go down is stronger than buoyancy, moving things on the surface is a nightmare unless you build things using high impact tolerance parts.

What's the point of being able to build rocket powered boats if we can't beat speed records?
can't wait to beat the "first supersonic boat " record! (spoiler: I wont)
